location
String String

Resource location

id
String String

Resource Id

name
String String

Resource name

type
String String

Resource type

tags
IDictionary<String, String> IDictionary(Of String, String)

Resource tags

plan
Plan Plan

The purchase plan when deploying virtual machine from VM Marketplace images.

hardwareProfile
HardwareProfile HardwareProfile

The hardware profile.

storageProfile
StorageProfile StorageProfile

The storage profile.

osProfile
OSProfile OSProfile

The OS profile.

networkProfile
NetworkProfile NetworkProfile

The network profile.

diagnosticsProfile
DiagnosticsProfile DiagnosticsProfile

The diagnostics profile.

availabilitySet
SubResource SubResource

The reference Id of the availability set to which the virtual machine belongs.

provisioningState
String String

The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

instanceView
VirtualMachineInstanceView VirtualMachineInstanceView

The virtual machine instance view.

licenseType
String String

Specifies that the image or disk that is being used was licensed on-premises. This element is only used for images that contain the Windows Server operating system.

vmId
String String

Specifies the VM unique ID which is a 128-bits identifier that is encoded and stored in all Azure IaaS VMs SMBIOS and can be read using platform BIOS commands.

resources
IList<VirtualMachineExtension> IList(Of VirtualMachineExtension)

The virtual machine child extension resources.
